attributes.action: Action against Islamist Extremists in The UK
attributes.additional_details:
We ask that the Prime minister will act for the safety of all British Citizens in the United Kingdom and put into action with immediate effect that any persons in the United Kingdom of Great Britain found to be publicly or privately promoting, preaching or acting out any form of islamist extremism within the UK should be subject to the toughest penalties under British Law.
Fines for publicly or privately preaching islamist hate.
Longer jail terms for anybody found to be plotting .
With the possibility of deportation from the UK for any of the above.
